msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. XAPrepare returned XA_RDONLY.

msgExplanation.p: The MQ XAPrepare function returned XA_RDONLY. Typically this means that earlier attempts to put messages to MQ were unsuccessful.

msgUserResponse.p: Check the destination of the mapping rule to ensure that it is able to receive messages, for example, check that a queue is not full.
